ScenarioDef.label: The Soulreaper
ScenarioDef.description: You've always wanted to be a hero, saving the weak, protecting them from certain death at the last moment. And fate gave you that chance: you came across a plundered caravan. The raiders left them no chance, leaving many dead and only two survivors, gravely wounded but still alive. You saved them, giving them a chance to survive as "part" of you.

scenario.summary: One reaperkind with no supplies and with 2 archiver forms. <color=#a1ff95>Easy</color> difficulty.
